title: Lines and Angles
description: Explore the building blocks of geometry - points, lines, and angles
learningObjectives: Understand points, lines, rays, and line segments
Recognize geometric patterns in real life

sections.title: 📐 Points and Lines
sections.content: A point is a dot! A ray goes on forever! ✨

sections.title: 🔍 Angle Hunt
sections.content: Find right angles in your room! Look for L-shapes!
